description:
http://anidb.net/ch114346 [Emilyko] has her first day of class with Rosemary and company until all hell breaks loose. http://anidb.net/ch114347 [Kate] makes a surprising discovery with Emilyko`s help. The two vow to learn from one another, but little do they know of the plan being hatched behind closed doors.
Source: Funimation
